location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

artifactGenerationProperties.Description: Properties for generating artifacts like dockerfile and manifests.

dockerfile.Description: Path to the Dockerfile within the repository.

dockerBuildContext.Description: Path to Dockerfile Build Context within the repository.

namespace.Description: Kubernetes namespace the application is deployed to.

acr.Description: Information on the azure container registry

oidcCredentials.Description: The fields needed for OIDC with GitHub.

aksResourceId.Description: The Azure Kubernetes Cluster Resource the application will be deployed to.

prURL.Description: The URL to the Pull Request submitted against the users repository.

pullNumber.Description: The number associated with the submitted pull request.

prStatus.Description: The status of the Pull Request submitted against the users repository.

authStatus.Description: Determines the authorization status of requests.

manifestType.Description: Determines the type of manifests within the repository.

helmChartPath.Description: Helm chart directory path in repository.

helmValues.Description: Helm Values.yaml file location in repository.

succeeded.Description: Describes if the workflow run succeeded.

workflowRunURL.Description: URL to the run of the workflow.

lastRunAt.Description: The timestamp of the last workflow run.

workflowRunStatus.Description: Describes the status of the workflow run

languageVersion.Description: The version of the language image used for execution in the generated dockerfile.

builderVersion.Description: The version of the language image used for building the code in the generated dockerfile.

port.Description: The port the application is exposed on.

dockerfileOutputDirectory.Description: The directory to output the generated Dockerfile to.

manifestOutputDirectory.Description: The directory to output the generated manifests to.

dockerfileGenerationMode.Description: The mode of generation to be used for generating Dockerfiles.

manifestGenerationMode.Description: The mode of generation to be used for generating Manifest.

manifestType.Description: Determines the type of manifests to be generated.

imageName.Description: The name of the image to be generated.

namespace.Description: The namespace to deploy the application to.

imageTag.Description: The tag to apply to the generated image.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)
